Texts.Chs: 作为阿维斯的先知，我可以证明她所谓的丈夫萨克里斯的邪恶本性。她通过我的梦和我说话。他和他的儿女都是叛徒，只顾自己。萨克里斯的精神在他的孩子、你们的丈夫、你们的兄弟和你们的儿子身上潜伏着。
Texts.Eng: As the prophet of Ahvis, I can attest to the vile nature of her supposed husband, Sahkris. She has spoken to me through my dreams. He and his children alike are betrayers, and care for none but themselves. The spirit of Sahkris lies dormant in his children, your husbands, your brothers, and your sons.

Texts.Chs: 作为阿维斯的孩子，我们必须复仇。抛弃那些你最珍视的人，因为他们总是在你背后准备着一把刀。只相信阿维斯，只相信我，她的先知，因为我会保护你，我会引导你，我会永远和你在一起。
Texts.Eng: We as children of Ahvis must take revenge. Abandon those whom you hold most dear, for they will always have a knife ready at your back. Trust only in Ahvis, and trust only in me, her prophet, for I will protect you, I will guide you, and I will always be with you.
